original_text: But if he does not have sufficient means to recover it, then what he sold shall remain in the hand of the buyer until the year of jubilee. In the jubilee it shall be released, and he shall return to his property.
korean_text: 그러나 자기가 무를 힘이 없으면 그 판 것이 희년에 이르기까지 산 자의 손에 있다가 희년에 이르러 돌아올지니 그것이 곧 그의 기업으로 돌아갈 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if he does not have sufficient means to recover it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 그것을 되찾을 충분한 자력이 없으면,

sentences.original_text: then what he sold shall remain in the hand of the buyer
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 판 것은 구매자의 손에 남아있게 될 것이며,

sentences.original_text: In the jubilee it shall be released,
and he shall return to his property.
